dashboard.control

Class MultiIncrementer

  • java.lang.Object
    • acm.graphics.GObject
      • acm.graphics.GCompound
        • dashboard.control.Control
          • dashboard.control.ButtonGrid
            • dashboard.control.MultiIncrementer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    acm.graphics.GContainer, acm.graphics.GScalable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class MultiIncrementer
extends ButtonGrid
    Implements a controller for multiple Incrementables. The functions of the constituent buttons are:

    INC - increment the currently-selected Incrementable one level

    DEC - decrement the currently-selected Incrementable one level

    SEL - set the currently-selected Incrementable to the one after the current, wrapping around if necessary

    Author:
    Mark Sabini

    • Method Detail

      • addIncrementable

        public void addIncrementable(Incrementable inc)
        Adds the specified Incrementable to the list of Incrementables controlled by the MultiIncrementer. If the Incrementable passed in is null, no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        inc - an Incrementable to be controlled by the MultiIncrementer
